definitions.definition: A two-dimensional labeled data structure with columns of potentially different types, similar to a spreadsheet or SQL table
A popular Python library for creating visualizations.
A Python library for data manipulation and analysis
A one-dimensional labeled array capable of holding any data type

concepts.name: Matplotlib
concepts.explanation: a popular Python library for creating static, interactive, and animated visualizations

concepts.name: NumPy
concepts.explanation: A Python library for numerical computing, which makes pandas fast and efficient for working with large datasets

concepts.name: Pandas
concepts.explanation: built on top of NumPy, providing a wide range of functionalities for data manipulation

concepts.name: Pandas Library
concepts.explanation: Essential for tasks ranging from data cleaning to complex data analysis and visualization

concepts.name: static, interactive, and animated visualizations
concepts.explanation: Types of visualizations offered by Matplotlib
